nodes.text: Bloodhawk Down was a mini-adventure published at Wizards.com on October 10, 2002 for Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game, to display the new content of Arms & Equipment Guide.

Min Erethen is a highly valued military scientist for Arakyd Industries. When her mobile base of operations, codenamed "Bloodhawk," crash lands on an uncivilized planet, the players must rush to rescue her.
